section.title: Syntax
section.para: TextMarker defines its own language for writing rules and rule scripts. This section gives a formal overview of its syntax.

Structure: The overall structure of a TextMarker script is defined by the following syntax. Script -> PackageDeclaration GlobalStatements Statements PackageDeclaration -> "PACKAGE" DottedIdentifier ";" GlobalStatments -> GlobalStatement* GlobalStatment -> ("TYPESYSTEM" | "SCRIPT" | "ENGINE") DottedIdentifier2 ";" Statements -> Statement* Statement -> Declaration | VariableDeclaration | BlockDeclaration | AutomataDeclaration | SimpleStatement ";"
Comments are excluded from the syntax definition. Comments start with "//" and always go to the end of the line.
Identifier DottedIdentifier -> Identifier ("." Identifier)* DottedIdentifier2 -> Identifier (("."|"-") Identifier)* Identifier -> letter (letter|digit)*
